data.name: Time Keeper Demo
data.detailed_description:
Time Keeper: Apprentice is a prologue to the game Time Keeper. Play as Tic Toc, a small windup robot who is tasked with repairing the Cosmic Clock. Avoid hazards, flip switches, activate devices and solve mechanical puzzles. It's all in a days work for an apprentice Time Keeper, are you up to the challenge?

Use your game controller (or keyboard) to find lost parts, locate keys to locked switches and explore your way through ever challenging environments.

Helpful Devices


Utilize helpful mechanical devices in your quest to restore the Master Mechanisms of the Cosmic Clock. Discover their abilities and use them to progress and achieve your goals.
data.about_the_game:
Time Keeper: Apprentice is a prologue to the game Time Keeper. Play as Tic Toc, a small windup robot who is tasked with repairing the Cosmic Clock. Avoid hazards, flip switches, activate devices and solve mechanical puzzles. It's all in a days work for an apprentice Time Keeper, are you up to the challenge?

Use your game controller (or keyboard) to find lost parts, locate keys to locked switches and explore your way through ever challenging environments.

Helpful Devices


Utilize helpful mechanical devices in your quest to restore the Master Mechanisms of the Cosmic Clock. Discover their abilities and use them to progress and achieve your goals.
data.short_description: Time Keeper: Apprentice is a story driven puzzle platformer where you flip switches, activate devices and solve "cause and effect" mechanical puzzles. Explore your way through increasingly challenging environments and help solve the mystery of the temporal anomalies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) 2 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel (R) HD Graphics or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.4 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 920m or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
